TopicTitle: Please tell me multiplayer will be like this..

Articles.Content: I just had a vision of how I might be able to enjoy multiplayer in KSP. Imagine this: Russia, the USA, and China each have their own space programs in different geographic areas, with different goals for space exploration. What if KSP players could join a server with a persistent world where each player could have his own space program in a different place on Kerbin? The players could cooperate or race each other. The could help build a space station in orbit or construct competing bases on the Mun. Does anyone think that this would be a great idea?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88533

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85315

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64898

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64079

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/61709

You're most definitely not the first one to think of this. Though unfortunately no one knows how multiplayer will work for now. I think I'd rather just have simple multiplayer, like what DMP does right now.

Also, moved to development discussion.

Edited August 16, 2014 by stupid_chris

That... is an impressive list of threads. You found a lot!

Also, this would probably involve space weapons. Imagine people in "gentlemens navel battle club" going onto a server, or a large modded server with Bahas armory...

*shudder*
